DOC.brief_summary: The study primarily aim evaluate immunogenicity safety influenza vaccine ( cell culture derive seasonal trivalent influenza vaccine ( cTIV ) influenza virus vaccine ( egg-derived seasonal trivalent , thiomersal free ; eTIV_a ) ) administer alone administer concomitantly pneumococcal polysaccharide vaccine ( PV ) elderly subject . The study also aim evaluate safety immunogenicity ( subset ) annual vaccination either cTIV eTIV_a adult elderly subject .
DOC.brief_title: Second Extension Study Evaluate Safety Tolerability Influenza Vaccines Adults Elderly , Evaluate Immunogenicity Concomitant Vaccination With Pneumococcal Vaccine Subgroup
